text:
Ricci Ferigo (born 2 December 1995) is a New Zealand water polo player. She competed for the New Zealand women's national water polo team in the 2014 World Women's Junior Water Polo Championships and 2017 World Aquatics Championships.
She graduated from Auckland University of Technology. At the club level, she played for Marist Water Polo Club.
